scripts.network: node -e "const os = require('os'); const interfaces = os.networkInterfaces(); Object.keys(interfaces).forEach(key => { interfaces[key].forEach(iface => { if (iface.family === 'IPv4' && !iface.internal) { console.log('\n🌐 Your IP Address:', iface.address); console.log('📱 Access from phone: http://' + iface.address + ':3000'); console.log('💻 Local access: http://localhost:3000\n'); } }); }); " && node src/app.js
